inclusion.criterion: early uni- or bilateral defect in pars interarticularis in the CT-scan
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: no signs of bony sclerosis on CT
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: bone marrow edema in lumbar spinal MR images
inclusion.label: met

notes: The patient has a confirmed diagnosis of Paget's Disease of Bone and is being treated with Bisphosphonate. The patient's sister had the same problems and was diagnosed with Paget's disease at age 52.
